name: 透
text:
え、ごめん
早かった？
trans:
Huh, sorry.
Was I too fast?

name: 円香
text:
……ううん
気にしなくていい

name: 円香
text: 同じ場所を、同じ足取りで歩く
trans:
I was always walking at the same place,
at the same pace.

name: 円香
text: 正しいかたちをなぞるように
trans: So as to copy the right form.

name: 円香
trans: ......Why, are we here at the sea?

name: 円香
text:
いや、もうやめたほうがいい
そういうの
trans:
No, I should just stop already.
Doing things like that...

name: 円香
text: 夢はいつか覚めるものだし
trans: I'll awaken from the dream one day anyway.

name: 円香
text: 飛べばいつかは落ちる
trans: And if I fly, I'll fall one day.

name: 円香
trans: And what about the beautiful thing?

name: 円香
trans: It doesn't matter what it is anymore.

name: 雛菜
text: 雛菜たちは、透先輩についていくけど
trans: The two of us will be following Toru-senpai.

name: 円香
text: 浅倉だけが先を行くように見えるのは
trans: It looking like Asakura is the only one running ahead is

name: 円香
text: 苦しいし、みっともない

name: 円香
text:
正しいかたちを
なぞっているのに
trans:
Even though
I was copying the right form.

name: 円香
text: あるべきかたちになっていく
trans: I'm still turning into what I was always meant to be.

name: 円香
text: 魂を曝け出したくなんかない
trans: I don't want my soul exposed at all.

name: 円香
trans: The fire set the skies ablaze.

name: 円香
text: 湧き上がる感情のまま
trans: With all my emotions welled up,
